O2Jam Hold Object¶

class reamber.o2jam.O2JHoldObj.O2JHoldObj(volume: int = 0, pan: int = 8, offset: float = 0.0, column: int = 0, length: float = 0.0)¶

Bases: reamber.base.HoldObj.HoldObj, reamber.o2jam.O2JNoteObjMeta.O2JNoteObjMeta

Defines the O2Jam Bpm Object

The O2Jam Bpm Object is stored in binary file .ojn
